system.description: When you try to persuade someone to do something, roll +Sway. For NPCs: on a hit, they'll do what you want if you meet their conditions. On a 10+, their conditions are reasonable. On a 7-9, they want something more costly or difficult.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: They refuse, and you lose standing with them. Future persuasion attempts may be harder.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: They'll do what you want, but their conditions are costly or difficult.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: They'll do what you want if you meet their reasonable conditions.
